foreignData.name: Kornkreis
foreignData.text:
Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments kannst du die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek auf deinen Friedhof legen.
Delirium — {2}{G}, opfere den Kornkreis: Bringe bis zu eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl und bis zu eine Länderkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur, falls dein Friedhof vier oder mehr unterschiedliche Kartentypen enthält.

foreignData.name: Marca en la cosecha
foreignData.text:
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, puedes poner la primera carta de tu biblioteca en tu cementerio.
Delirio — {2}{G}, sacrificar la Marca en la cosecha: Regresa hasta una carta de criatura objetivo y hasta una carta de tierra objetivo de tu cementerio a tu mano. Activa esta habilidad solo si entre las cartas de tu cementerio hay cuatro o más tipos de cartas.

foreignData.name: Sigille de culture
foreignData.text:
Au début de votre entretien, vous pouvez mettre la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque dans votre cimetière.
Délire — {2}{G}, sacrifiez le Sigille de culture : Renvoyez jusqu'à une carte de créature ciblée et jusqu'à une carte de terrain ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main. N'activez cette capacité que s'il y a au moins quatre types de carte parmi les cartes de votre cimetière.

foreignData.name: Sigillo nel Grano
foreignData.text:
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, puoi mettere nel tuo cimitero la prima carta del tuo grimorio.
Delirio — {2}{G}, Sacrifica il Sigillo nel Grano: Riprendi in mano fino a una carta creatura bersaglio e fino a una carta terra bersaglio dal tuo cimitero. Attiva questa abilità solo se ci sono quattro o più tipi di carta tra le carte nel tuo cimitero.

foreignData.name: 収穫の印章
foreignData.text:
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたは、あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードをあなたの墓地に置いてもよい。
昂揚 ― {2}{G}, 収穫の印章を生け贄に捧げる：あなたの墓地から、クリーチャー・カード最大１枚と土地・カード最大１枚を対象とし、それらをあなたの手札に戻す。この能力は、あなたの墓地にあるカードにカード・タイプが合計４種類以上含まれるときにのみ起動できる。

foreignData.name: 경작지의 인장
foreignData.text:
당신의 유지단 시작에, 당신은 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 한 장을 당신의 무덤에 넣을 수 있다.
섬망 — {2}{G}, 경작지의 인장을 희생한다: 당신의 무덤에 있는 생물 카드 최대 한 장과 대지 카드 최대 한 장을 목표로 정한다. 그 카드들을 당신의 손으로 되돌린다. 이 능력은 당신의 무덤에 네 개 이상의 카드 유형이 있을 때에만 활성화할 수 있다.

foreignData.name: Símbolo na Plantação
foreignData.text:
No início de sua manutenção, você pode colocar o card do topo de seu grimório em seu cemitério.
Delírio — {2}{G}, Sacrifique Símbolo na Plantação: Devolva até um card de criatura alvo e até um card de terreno alvo de seu cemitério para sua mão. Ative esta habilidade somente se houver quatro ou mais tipos de card entre os cards de seu cemitério.

foreignData.name: Знак на Поле
foreignData.text:
В начале вашего шага поддержки вы можете положить верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки на ваше кладбище.
Буйство — {2}{G}, пожертвуйте Знак на Поле: верните не более одной целевой карты существа и не более одной целевой карты земли из вашего кладбища в вашу руку. Активируйте эту способность, только если среди карт на вашем кладбище есть не менее четырех типов карт.

foreignData.name: 燃田作印
foreignData.text:
在你的维持开始时，你可以将你的牌库顶牌置入你的坟墓场。
躁狂～{2}{G}，牺牲燃田作印：将至多一张目标生物牌和至多一张目标地牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。只能于你坟墓场中牌的类别有四种或更多时起动此异能。

foreignData.name: 燃田作印
foreignData.text:
在你的維持開始時，你可以將你的牌庫頂牌置入你的墳墓場。
躁狂～{2}{G}，犧牲燃田作印：將至多一張目標生物牌和至多一張目標地牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。只能於你墳墓場中牌的類別有四種或更多時起動此異能。

mainBoard.name: Crop Sigil
mainBoard.originalText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put the top card of your library into your graveyard.
Delirium — {2}{G}, Sacrifice Crop Sigil: Return up to one target creature card and up to one target land card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
mainBoard.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may mill a card.
Delirium — {2}{G}, Sacrifice Crop Sigil: Return up to one target creature card and up to one target land card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

mainBoard.name: Mournwillow
mainBoard.originalText:
Haste
Delirium — When Mournwillow enters the battlefield, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, creatures with power 2 or less can't block this turn.

rulings.text: Because the last ability’s effect doesn’t change the characteristics of any permanents, the set of creatures affected is constantly updated. Any creature with power 2 or less at the moment blockers are chosen will be unable to block.

mainBoard.name: Moldgraf Scavenger
mainBoard.originalText: Delirium — Moldgraf Scavenger gets +3/+0 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card's front face while it's not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won't be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object's delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

The card types in Magic are artifact, battle, creature, enchantment, instant, kindred, land, planeswalker, and sorcery. Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain's Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.

mainBoard.text: Delirium — Moldgraf Scavenger gets +3/+0 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

mainBoard.name: Grapple with the Past
mainBoard.originalText: Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard, then you may return a creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand.

rulings.text: Grapple with the Past doesn’t target the card to return to your hand. After putting the top three cards of your library into your graveyard, you may choose from among any creature or land cards there.

mainBoard.text: Mill three cards, then you may return a creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill three cards, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)
